name: 4 Hints 1 Answer - Kids Word Puzzle
description:
Looking for fun word puzzles you can play on your time? 4 Hints, 1 Answer is the word game you've been waiting for! Examine the four hints – if you can figure out how they're related you can make it rain coins! Sweet, glorious coins! Use these coins to purchase helpful power ups like ZAPS which remove an unneeded letter or HINTS which give you a correct letter in the answer.

Used up your power ups and still need help? Don't panic! 4 Hints, 1 Answer links up to Twitter or Facebook, ask your friends and get them in on the fun too! With 300+ puzzles to play don't be stingy! Share all the fun with your friends!

Pick up and play when you have the time, put it away when you don't! 4 Hints, 1 Answer is the perfect word game for all ages!

−Free and fun, start playing today!
−No long time commitments, ready to play and ready to stop whenever you are!
−Earn coins by playing, spend coins on power-ups!
−Get help from friends on Twitter and Facebook!
−300+ puzzles suitable for all ages!
